name: JavaScript Arcade
body:
### Current Games
Classic arcade favorites Falldown and Breakout

### Stack
Rails, JavaScript, JQuery, HTML/HTML 5 Canvas, AJAX, and CSS

### Features Implemented
* Persistant High Scores
* Levels with increasing difficulty
* Sound Effects
* Maximum number of lives
* Pause button

### Demo
[Play Live Demo Now](https://javascript-arcade.herokuapp.com/)

### Screenshot
![JavaScript Arcade Screenshot](http://i57.tinypic.com/ea59xj.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
